mapper.select: SELECT v.vdr_name , v.vdr_code , v.biz_no , (SELECT emp_name FROM employees e WHERE e.emp_id = v.emp_id) emp_id , v.credit_price , v.credit_bal_price , v.credit_period , get_credit_status(credit_bal_price, credit_price ) status , (SELECT MAX(c.update_date) FROM chit c JOIN orders o ON ord_code = article_code WHERE o.vdr_code = v.vdr_code AND c.status = 'cst04') AS createdDate FROM vender v ORDER BY v.vdr_code

SELECT c.article_code , v.credit_price , c.tot_price , v.credit_bal_price , v.bank , v.acct_no , c.type , getEmpName(v.emp_id, #{comId}) as emp_id , c.created_date , getEmpName(c.phy_emp_id, #{comId}) as phy_emp_id , c.chit_code FROM chit c JOIN orders o ON ord_code = article_code JOIN vender v ON o.vdr_code = v.vdr_code WHERE o.vdr_code = #{vdrCode} AND c.status = 'cst04'
